alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Hyde; Martin; Pitt; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 5:09AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Washington, eastern Pitt, northwestern Hyde, southeastern Martin and northern Beaufort Counties through 545 AM EDT... At 508 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Old Ford, or near Washington, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Washington, Belhaven, Pinetown, Ponzer, Pungo, Bunyan, Pike Road, Leechville, Wenona, Terra Ceia, Old Ford, Phelps Lake, Pungo Lake, Long Acre VFD, Washington Park and Pantego. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Mainland Hyde; Martin; Pitt; Washington
